name: Little Bookmates SAPI de CV
description: Developer of a book exchange platform designed to help develop children's reading habits. The company's platform offers a subscription service through which users receive a set of books every month, delivered to their doorstep, enabling parents to save money on purchasing of books.
one_liner: Developer of a book exchange platform designed to help develop children's reading habits. The company's platform offers a subscription service through which users receive a set of books every month, delivered to their doorstep, enabling parents to save money on purchasing of books.
